action.action-desc: Mr. Pitts introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To provide dollars to the classroom.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Dollars to the Classroom Act .

section.header: Limitation on use by States of Federal funds provided for elementary and secondary education
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, not less than 95 percent of any Federal funds made available to a State or State educational agency by the Secretary of Education for a purpose relating to elementary or secondary education shall be usedâ€”

paragraph.text: for academic and classroom (or classroom-related) purposes; or
at the elementary school or secondary school level.
